welcome.title: , where your beauty and well-being come first.

greeting.title: Crafting Confidence
greeting.subtitle: Your Beauty, Our Passion
paragraphs: In a serene, stylish setting, I take the time to understand your wishes and needs in order to provide you with personalized treatments of the highest standard. Whether it’s facial treatments, eyelash extensions, or lash and brow lifting, every procedure is carried out with utmost care, sensitivity, and adherence to the strictest hygiene and quality standards.

Treat yourself to a restorative break from everyday life and experience visible results along with a fresh, well-groomed appearance. I am very much looking forward to meeting you in person and providing you with a pleasant, feel-good experience at Leonti Aesthetic.
greeting.name: Ecaterina Leonti

cncShop.title: CNC Shop
cncShop.description: An exclusive selection of professional cosmetic products from the CNC brand — developed for all skin types and every skin need.
cncShop.blueInfo: Whether it’s anti-aging, blemished skin, couperose, pigmentation, dryness or sensitivity — find targeted skincare solutions tailored to you.
